title: The Poseidon Adventure
description: On its maiden voyage, luxury ocean liner "Poseidon" is capsized by a massive undersea earthquake. A handful of survivors must fight for their livesâ€”struggling to make it from the upper deck of the ship to the hull, the only part above water before the ship sinks. Faced with rising water and the violence of desperate passengers and crewmembers, the group must do everything it can to survive - before time runs out.Adapted into an award-winning film by Irwin Allen, "The Poseidon Adventure" is a thrilling tale with timeless suspense and excitement.
author: Paul Gallico
